body_html: Yeah, that is because all the confirmation was being made without persisting the data, so we were assuming that if a team had a conference preference it had put true in the fields. Now that we are persisting those fields, we can verify this better. I will change it! 👍

body: Yeah, that is because all the confirmation was being made without persisting the data, so we were assuming that if a team had a conference preference it had put true in the fields. Now that we are persisting those fields, we can verify this better. I will change it! :+1:
